plot: Li is a well-respected soldier for an immense Yakuza gumi plagued by the past and driven by a sense of duty and honor, he lives each day expecting and ready to die. But when he meets Bess, all that changes.
title: Kabuki Mono: The Crazy Ones
plot_es: Li is a well-respected soldier for an immense Yakuza gumi plagued by the past and driven by a sense of duty and honor, he lives each day expecting and ready to die. But when he meets Bess, all that changes.
plot_en: Li is a well-respected soldier for an immense Yakuza gumi plagued by the past and driven by a sense of duty and honor, he lives each day expecting and ready to die. But when he meets Bess, all that changes.
